mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.time AS "time", a.approver_id AS "approverId", a.leave_permit_id AS "leavePermitId", a.type AS "type", a.approver_type AS "approverType", a.children_id AS "childrenId", a.display AS "display"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_approver( id, create_date, update_date, del_flag, time, approver_id, leave_permit_id, type, approver_type, children_id, display ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{time}, #{approverId}, #{leavePermitId}, #{type}, #{approverType}, #{childrenId}, #{display} )
mapper.update: UPDATE check_approver SET update_date = #{updateDate}, time = #{time}, approver_id = #{approverId}, leave_permit_id = #{leavePermitId}, type = #{type}, approver_type = #{approverType}, children_id = #{childrenId}, display = #{display} WHERE id = #{id}
